definition: modernization of agriculture, one of Deng Xiaoping's Four Modernizations

pinyin: nong2 ye4 sheng1 chan3 he2 zuo4 she4

sentences.english: Agriculture consists largely of subsistence farming and animal husbandry.
sentences.chinese: 在農業中佔很大部分的是種植業和畜牧業。

sentences.english: And rural villagers in southern Africa harvest caterpillars from the local mopane trees.
sentences.chinese: 南非的一些農業村莊也從可樂豆木上收穫毛蟲。

sentences.english: The Dianchi Lake plays an important role in the industrial and agricultural production of Kunming Metropolitan and the everyday life of the people.
sentences.chinese: 滇池在昆明地區工農業生產和民人生活中起重要作用。

sentences.english: The Agricultural Age has brought about the agriculturization of the planet.
sentences.chinese: 農業時代爲我們的世界帶來了農業化。

sentences.english: The Agricultural Age has brought about the agriculturization of the planet.
sentences.chinese: 農業時代爲我們的世界帶來了農業化。

sentences.english: Gradually push forward the controls over the total amount and quota management of agricultural water consumption.
sentences.chinese: 逐步推行農業用水總量控制與定額管理。

sentences.english: When we were an agrarian nation, all cars were trucks.
sentences.chinese: 在我們是農業國家的時候，所有的車子都是卡車。

sentences.english: There is a great potential of developing the agriculture relying on the Yellow River by exploiting the resource of land in Yinbei, Ningxia.
sentences.chinese: 開發銀北土地資源，是寧夏發展黃河農業的潛力所在。

sentences.english: Look for the green seal that says USDA Organic.
sentences.chinese: 尋找標有“美國農業部有機”的綠色圖章。

sentences.english: A changing climate is adding pressure to the already-stressed agricultural sector.
sentences.chinese: 氣候變化正在增加農業部門已經承受的壓力。

sentences.english: Conception of agricultural technology popularization system at the new stage of China;
sentences.chinese: 健全的農業推廣體系是實現科技興農的組織保證。

sentences.english: In here, from the slash-and-burn cultivation to the high tech agriculture, obtains the demonstration.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，從刀耕火種到高科技農業，都得到展示。

sentences.english: The opening ceremony was moderated by Du Qinglin, Minister of Agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 開幕式由農業部部長杜青林主持。

sentences.english: Yang Hao goes to school to get knowledge about farming in Beijiang.
sentences.chinese: 楊浩上學是爲了得到農業方面的知識。

sentences.english: AgBank's historical relationship with agriculture has been complicated.
sentences.chinese: 農行與農業的歷史關係一向很複雜。

sentences.english: An a mountainous area county attends a meeting research agriculture and rural economics job.
sentences.chinese: 一個山區縣開會研究農業和農村經濟工作。
